name: Marty in the Chair
description:
Work as Marty, a newly employed assistant for a State funded project involved with super heroes.

This game was made in a week for a game-jam and is severely rough and unfinished. I hope you enjoy the concept.

Some fun bits.
The AI has three layers

* It uses an animation controller to handle some triggers.

* A Pos/Neg Feedback system to encourage discourage more of certain behaviors. Unfortunately the sample scene isn't busy enough to showcase this.

* A hyperbolic falloff zone allowing more control for how to assign priority to certain types of actions.

It also uses a queueing system for scheduling actions which can be interrupted (or not depending on the settings for that particular action)
